channel.title: -HELP!-Tutorial And Source+Client Needed!-HELP!-
channel.description:
[b][/b][size=14pt][/size] Hey guys it's Alextheman , I'm a bit of a nub/beginner when it comes to java etc , atm. So I was wondering whether someone amazing , could give me a tutorial and a server+client with these features.
317 rev with new items/npc's. Moneypouch All skills Easy to add shops,npc's etc And dung! :D
And also a tutorial + webclient :D
So your wondering "What's in it for me?" Well... I will rep you , give you admin on my server , and full credits :D
Alextheman.
